Name: Sang an St. Barbara
Notes: A tribute to the patron saint of miners. First performed in the underground 'Kuppelsaal' of the salt mine in Friedrichshall-Kochendorf. Demanding for the soprano, otherwise easy.
Long Description: A tribute to the patron saint of miners. First performed in the underground 'Kuppelsaal' of the salt mine in Friedrichshall-Kochendorf. Demanding for the soprano, otherwise easy.
Short Description: A tribute to the patron saint of miners.
